## Latest Blog Posts

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import requests
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from dateutil import parser
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from IPython.display import HTML

def fetch_wordpress_posts(url="https://blog.samarthya.me/wps/wp-json/wp/v2/posts", limit=3):
    params = {
        'per_page': limit,
        'orderby': 'date',
        'order': 'desc',
        '_embed': 1
    }

    try:
        response = requests.get(url, params=params)
        response.raise_for_status()
        return response.json()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error fetching posts: {e}")
        return []

def get_featured_image(post):
    if '_embedded' in post and 'wp:featuredmedia' in post['_embedded']:
        media = post['_embedded']['wp:featuredmedia'][0]
        if 'source_url' in media:
            return media['source_url']
    return "assets/images/logo-mine-1.jpg"  # Default image if none found

# Fetch posts
posts = fetch_wordpress_posts()

if posts:
    html_content = '<div class="blog-showcase"><div class="blog-showcase-grid">'

    for post in posts:
        title = post['title']['rendered']
        link = post['link']
        featured_image = get_featured_image(post)

        # Get categories
        categories = []
        if '_embedded' in post and 'wp:term' in post['_embedded']:
            for terms in post['_embedded']['wp:term']:
                for term in terms:
                    if term['taxonomy'] == 'category':
                        categories.append(term['name'])

        category = categories[0] if categories else 'Blog'

        html_content += f"""
        <a href="{link}" class="blog-showcase-link" target="_blank">
            <div class="blog-showcase-item">
                <img src="{featured_image}" alt="{title}">
                <div class="blog-showcase-overlay">
                    <h3 class="blog-showcase-title">{title}</h3>
                    <div class="blog-showcase-category">{category}</div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </a>
        """

    html_content += '</div></div>'

    display(HTML(html_content))
else:
    display(HTML('<p>Unable to fetch blog posts at the moment.</p>'))
```
